description.value:
Visions of the worst possible outcome of the conflict that is happening or is immediately going to happen floods the mind of the target, requiring a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 1 and any time during the duration of the spell, if they are critically hit, they become frightened 1.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and any time during the duration of the spell, if they are critically hit, they become frightened 1.

Heightened (+1) One additional target can be specified.

Heightened (+1) The spell's duration becomes 1 minute and does not require sustaining.

Heightened (+1) The range becomes 120 feet.

Heightened (+1) The target of the spell can't drop below frightened 1 at the end of its turn if it has been successfully Struck since the end of its last turn.

Heightened (+2) The target becomes frightened 2 when critically hit if critically fails against this effect.
